title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Materials For Loan
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Materials For Loan              Materials For Loan       Video Loan Service The following DVD is available for loan from the park:  "Fort Spokane Frontier Outpost to Indian Boarding School" 11 minutes  An overview of the different eras of Fort Spokane: military, boarding school, tuberculosis hospital and National Park. This video has historically been shown at the Fort Spokane Visitor Center. It is also in the Fort Spokane Traveling Trunk.       To make a reservation for a video please complete and return this form.
